data: Notify the BMT Navigator's of new admission
1- No CPR, Supportive Care, No Intubation
5- No CPR, Critical Care, May Intunbate
If temperature greater than or equal to 38 DegC, draw Blood Cultures X 2 and notify provider
Use thrombocytopenic precautions such as soft toothbrush and electric razor only. Do not administer enemas, suppositories, IM injections, ASA or non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs)
White Petrolatum OintmentPetrolatum Topical Ointment (White Petrolatum Ointment)
1 application, topical, PRN Other (see comment), Leave at bedside
15 mL, swish and spit, BID, After breakfast and at bedtime
Starting Diet: General Diet, Only starting diet will be initiated. RD/RN to place a separate diet order for subsequent diet
Thrombocytopenic precautions include no enemas, suppositories, IM injections, ASA or non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs)
For Fever orders please use the HEM Febrile Neutropenia Initial Management PowerPlan
600 mg, PO, once, drug form: tab
300 mg, PO, q6h, order duration: 6 doses or times, drug form: tab
300 mg, PO, qdaily, order duration: 7 day, drug form: tab
300 mg, PO, qdaily, order duration: 7 day, drug form: tab

aluminium-magnesium hydroxide  40 mg-40 mg/mL Oral liq (ALMAGEL EQUIV)
30 mL, PO, q4h, PRN indigestion,drug form: oral liq

17 g, PO, qdaily, PRN: Constipation, drug form: powder
24 mg, PO, qHS, PRN: Constipsation, drug form: tab
2 mg, PO, as directed, PRN: diarrhea, drug form: tab
Select ongoing Laboratory tests below if not ordering tumour lysis blood work
Blood, Urgent, Unit Collect: No, Collection: T;N, once
Blood, AM Draw, Unit Collect: No, Collection: T+1;0330, qdaily for 8 week
If/when Hemoglobin is less than 70 g/L, then notify provider
If/when Platelet count is less than 10x10^9/L, then notify provider
ORDERING INSTRUCTIONS: CBC and Differential is required to be ordered concurrently with Reticulocytes
